item.title: Get start with BugBounty, Pentest and Security Researcher
item.description: I have always been in confusion about how to get started with security or pentest or somehow with a bug bounty. There are tons of resources available on the internet. The Fact The fact is there is no hard and fast rule or there is no standard course by following which you will get the tag of a security expert. There is no defined way to become a security researcher.
